attributes.additional_details:
For David Beckham not to be included in the Olympic football squad is a disgrace. He has been a fine servant to sport in this country, providing much entertainment to many millions of people. His tireless commitment in helping our successful Olympic bid should be rewarded with a place in the football squad.
I would like the goverment to intervene in this matter and immediately contact the management of Team GB and demand that Mr Beckham is added to the squad.
